amendment.description: To require baselines for and testing of block configurations of the Ballistic Missile Defense System.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3354 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3354 proposed by Senator Reed. (consideration: CR S6928, S6941; text: CR S6928) To require baselines for and testing of block configurations of the Ballistic Missile Defense System.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3354 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3354 proposed by Senator Reed.
